about_the_game:
AVOID GAME is a simple yet addictive dodge action game! Players control a green square to avoid orange and gray squares falling from the sky. The goal is to survive as long as possible while avoiding the squares, which fall at different speeds.

You've become a green square, and orange and gray squares are coming for you to destroy you.
This game involves moving the green squares to avoid the gray and orange squares.

The game starts right away with no breaks, and the only way to avoid them is to die.

Features:
Simple gameplay mechanics: Simple controls that anyone can pick up and play quickly.
Addictive dodging: You'll lose track of time as you dodge the fast-falling orange and gray squares.
Infinite survival mode: No competition system, no stages, just a constant challenge - keep beating your own record!

Take control of a cute green square and experience the exhilarating fun of dodging in Square Dodge. Test your limits by surviving as long as you can - try it now!
